item.title: Jin Jiang International Hotels and Hanwha Hotels & Resorts have officially merged their loyalty programs
item.description: Jin Jiang International Hotels from China and Hanwha Hotels & Resorts from Korea have joined their loyalty programs. Starting September 1st, members of Jin Jiang’s J-Club and Hanwha’s THE PLUS will share membership benefits. This includes perks like discounts on rooms, food, and beverages, as well as late check-outs and room upgrades at both hotel groups. J-Club’s over 14 million members will also have access to Hanwha’s resorts and golf courses across Korea.
